column4: I am unable to toggle between the workspaces by scrolling the mouse wheel in 9.10 which i was able to in 8.04, wht is missing?
I am unable to toggle between the workspaces by scrolling the mouse wheel in 9.10 which i was able to in 8.04, wht is missing?
Install CCSM, and look for something in the settings of "Viewport Switcher"
It might be somewhere. I don't know exactly.
